name: UW Login - Insurance Application Test Suite
description: Comprehensive testing of the insurance application workflow from UW login through IMS flow initialization including positive, negative, and edge case scenarios

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify successful application flow with GL+MTC coverage selection
test_cases.precondition:
1. UW user is logged into the system
2. Active insured record exists in system
3. System is accessible and functional
test_cases.steps:
1. Create active insured with valid details
2. Register using same email and company name
3. Submit registration
4. Edit record and fill required details
5. Generate quick quote and proceed
6. Fill application tabs with valid data
7. Navigate to Drivers and Vehicles, upload template
8. Navigate to Coverages tab and select GL+MTC
9. Generate application
10. Submit application
11. Click ellipse in list view and select view quote
12. Click accept and select billing type
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. Record shows 'Pending Quick Quote' status
2. Quick quote generates successfully
3. Application is created with GL+MTC coverage
4. Quote is accepted with selected billing
5. IMS flow starts successfully
test_cases.post_condition:
1. Application status is accepted
2. IMS workflow is initiated
3. Record is updated with billing information

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify successful application flow with PD coverage only
test_cases.precondition:
1. UW user is logged into system
2. Active insured exists
3. Valid PDF file available for PD template upload
test_cases.steps:
1. Create active insured
2. Register with same credentials
3. Submit registration
4. Edit record and complete quick quote
5. Fill application details
6. Navigate to Drivers and Vehicles with manual updates
7. Select only PD coverage in Coverages tab
8. Generate application
9. Upload PD template PDF file
10. Submit application
11. View quote from list
12. Accept quote with billing selection
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. PD coverage is selected successfully
2. PD template uploads without errors
3. Application generates with PD coverage only
4. Quote acceptance completes successfully
5. IMS flow initiates
test_cases.post_condition:
1. Application contains only PD coverage
2. PD template is attached to record
3. IMS workflow started

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify application flow with all coverage types (MTC+GL+PD)
test_cases.precondition:
1. UW user logged in
2. Active insured record available
3. Valid PDF for PD template ready
test_cases.steps:
1. Create active insured
2. Register using same details
3. Submit and edit record
4. Generate quick quote
5. Complete application tabs
6. Upload driver/vehicle template
7. Select MTC, GL, and PD coverages
8. Generate application
9. Upload PD template
10. Submit application
11. Access quote via ellipse menu
12. Accept with billing type selection
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. All three coverage types selected successfully
2. Application generates with complete coverage
3. PD template uploads correctly
4. Quote acceptance processes all coverages
5. IMS flow starts with full coverage
test_cases.post_condition:
1. Record contains all coverage types
2. All templates attached
3. IMS initiated with comprehensive coverage

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify quote rejection flow terminates process correctly
test_cases.precondition:
1. UW user authenticated
2. Active insured exists
3. Application ready for quote review
test_cases.steps:
1. Create and register active insured
2. Complete application with GL coverage
3. Generate and submit application
4. Navigate to quote view
5. Click reject instead of accept
6. Confirm rejection
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. Quote rejection is processed
2. Rejection reason is captured
3. Flow terminates as expected
4. No IMS flow initiation occurs
5. Record status updated to rejected
test_cases.post_condition:
1. Application status shows rejected
2. Process flow terminated
3. No further workflow steps available

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify manual driver and vehicle entry with GL+PD coverage
test_cases.precondition:
1. User logged into UW system
2. Active insured created
3. Application in edit mode
test_cases.steps:
1. Register active insured
2. Edit record and generate quick quote
3. Navigate to Drivers and Vehicles tab
4. Enter driver details manually
5. Add vehicle information manually
6. Select GL and PD coverages
7. Generate application
8. Upload PD template
9. Submit application
10. Accept quote with billing selection
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. Manual driver/vehicle entry saves correctly
2. GL+PD coverage selection processes
3. Application generation succeeds
4. Quote acceptance completes
5. IMS flow initiates
test_cases.post_condition:
1. Manual entries stored in system
2. GL+PD coverage active
3. IMS workflow started

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify duplicate email registration validation error
test_cases.precondition:
1. UW user logged in
2. Insured with specific email already exists in system
3. System validation rules active
test_cases.steps:
1. Create active insured with email test@company.com
2. Attempt to register another insured with same email
3. Submit registration form
4. Observe system response
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. System displays duplicate email error message
2. Registration is blocked
3. Form remains on registration page
4. Error message clearly indicates duplicate email issue
test_cases.post_condition:
1. No duplicate record created
2. Original record remains unchanged
3. User stays on registration form

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify PD template upload with invalid file format
test_cases.precondition:
1. Application created with PD coverage selected
2. Invalid file format (.txt) available for upload
3. PD template upload required
test_cases.steps:
1. Complete application flow up to PD coverage selection
2. Generate application with PD coverage
3. Attempt to upload .txt file as PD template
4. Click submit
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. System rejects invalid file format
2. Error message displays acceptable file formats
3. Upload fails validation
4. Application submission is blocked
test_cases.post_condition:
1. No invalid file attached
2. Application remains in draft status
3. User prompted to upload valid format

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify application submission without required coverage selection
test_cases.precondition:
1. UW user logged in
2. Application created and in edit mode
3. All tabs completed except coverage selection
test_cases.steps:
1. Complete insured registration
2. Fill all application tabs except coverages
3. Navigate to coverages tab without selecting any coverage
4. Attempt to generate application
5. Try to submit application
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. System validates coverage requirement
2. Error message indicates coverage must be selected
3. Application generation fails
4. Submission is blocked
test_cases.post_condition:
1. Application remains incomplete
2. Coverage selection required
3. Submission status unchanged

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify system behavior with empty driver and vehicle template upload
test_cases.precondition:
1. Application in progress
2. Empty Excel template file available
3. Driver and vehicle section accessible
test_cases.steps:
1. Navigate to Drivers and Vehicles tab
2. Attempt to upload empty template file
3. Process upload
4. Continue with application flow
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. System detects empty template
2. Validation error displayed for missing data
3. Upload is rejected or warning shown
4. User prompted to provide valid data
test_cases.post_condition:
1. No empty data processed
2. Template upload status shows error
3. Manual entry option remains available

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify maximum file size limit for PD template upload
test_cases.precondition:
1. PD coverage selected in application
2. File exceeding size limit available (>10MB assumed)
3. Upload functionality accessible
test_cases.steps:
1. Complete application with PD coverage
2. Generate application
3. Attempt to upload oversized PDF file as PD template
4. Process upload request
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. System validates file size
2. Error message shows maximum size limit
3. Upload is rejected
4. User guided to reduce file size
test_cases.post_condition:
1. Oversized file not uploaded
2. System performance maintained
3. Upload section ready for valid file

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify application flow with only MTC coverage selection
test_cases.precondition:
1. UW system accessible
2. Active insured created
3. Application ready for coverage selection
test_cases.steps:
1. Register active insured
2. Complete quick quote generation
3. Fill application details
4. Add drivers and vehicles via template
5. Select only MTC coverage
6. Generate application
7. Submit application
8. View and accept quote
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. MTC coverage only is processed correctly
2. Application generates successfully
3. Quote reflects MTC coverage pricing
4. Acceptance completes without PD template requirement
5. IMS flow starts
test_cases.post_condition:
1. Record shows MTC coverage only
2. No PD template attached
3. IMS workflow initiated

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify session timeout during application completion
test_cases.precondition:
1. User logged in and session active
2. Application partially completed
3. Session timeout configured in system
test_cases.steps:
1. Start application process
2. Complete 50% of application
3. Wait for session timeout period
4. Attempt to continue application
5. Try to submit application
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. Session timeout occurs
2. User redirected to login page
3. Session expiry message displayed
4. Application data preservation status indicated
test_cases.post_condition:
1. User session terminated
2. Application data saved or lost based on system design
3. Re-authentication required

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify concurrent access to same application record
test_cases.precondition:
1. Two UW users logged in simultaneously
2. Same application record accessible to both
3. Edit permissions available
test_cases.steps:
1. User A opens application for editing
2. User B opens same application for editing
3. User A makes changes and saves
4. User B attempts to make different changes
5. User B tries to save changes
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. System detects concurrent access
2. Appropriate locking or conflict resolution occurs
3. Data integrity maintained
4. Users notified of concurrent access situation
test_cases.post_condition:
1. Only valid changes saved
2. No data corruption occurred
3. Users aware of access conflicts

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify quote acceptance with different billing types
test_cases.precondition:
1. Application submitted and quote generated
2. Multiple billing options available
3. Quote ready for acceptance
test_cases.steps:
1. Access generated quote
2. Click accept quote
3. Select monthly billing option
4. Complete acceptance process
5. Verify billing setup
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. Billing type selection processed
2. Monthly billing configured correctly
3. Quote acceptance completed
4. Billing schedule established
5. IMS flow initiates with billing info
test_cases.post_condition:
1. Monthly billing active
2. Billing schedule created
3. IMS workflow started with billing data

test_cases.scenario_name: Verify system recovery after application submission failure
test_cases.precondition:
1. Application completed and ready for submission
2. System or network interruption simulated
3. Submission process initiated
test_cases.steps:
1. Complete entire application process
2. Initiate application submission
3. Simulate system interruption during submission
4. Restart system or restore connection
5. Check application status and attempt resubmission
test_cases.expected_outcome:
1. System detects incomplete submission
2. Application status shows appropriate state
3. Recovery mechanism activated
4. User can retry submission
5. Data integrity maintained
test_cases.post_condition:
1. Application data preserved
2. System state consistent
3. Resubmission possible
